00020 /*
00021   Chris, note there is a bit where I comment out how I really want to propagate instead
00022   of calling limit_reached, but I couldn't remember if you told me I could have
00023   that method or not.    It saves going through the whole clause. 
00024  */
00025 
00068 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_SUM_H
00069 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_SUM_H
00070 
00071 // VarToCount = 1 means leq, = 0 means geq.
00072 template<typename VarArray, typename VarSum, int VarToCount = 1, BOOL is_reversed = false >
00073   struct BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic : public AbstractConstraint
00074 {
00075   virtual string constraint_name()
00076     { if(VarToCount) return "Bool<=SumDynamic"; else return "Bool>=SumDynamic"; }
00077 
00078   typedef BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic<VarArray, VarSum,1-VarToCount> NegConstraintType;
00079   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00080   
00081   // When VarToCount=1 this constraint actually counts 0's and ensures there are var_sum or more.
00082   // Name of the class should really be changed, and VarToCount changed to val.. and values flipped
00083   // for it to make sense.
00084 
00085   VarArray var_array;
00086   VarSum var_sum;
00087 
00088   MemOffset unwatched_indexes;
00089   int last;
00090   int num_unwatched;
00091 
00092   int& unwatched(int i)
00093     { return static_cast<int*>(unwatched_indexes.get_ptr())[i]; }
00094 
00095   BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, VarSum _var_sum) :
00096   AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), var_sum(_var_sum), last(0)
00097   { 
00098     D_ASSERT((VarToCount == 0) || (VarToCount == 1));
00099 #ifndef DYNAMICTRIGGERS
00100     cerr << "This almost certainly isn't going to work... sorry" << endl;
00101 #endif
00102   // Sum of 1's is >= K
00103   // == Number of 1's is >=K         // this is the one I want to do
00104   // == Number of 0's is <= N-K
00105 
00106 
00107     int array_size = var_array.size();
00108 
00109     if (var_sum >= array_size || var_sum < 0)
00110     {
00111       // In these cases the constraints are all set before search.
00112       // This will happen before triggers set up in full_propagate
00113       // Thus zero triggers are needed
00114     }
00115     else
00116     {
00117       num_unwatched = array_size - var_sum - 1 ;
00118       D_ASSERT(num_unwatched >= 0);
00119       unwatched_indexes = getMemory(stateObj).nonBackTrack().request_bytes(sizeof(unsigned) * num_unwatched);
00120     }
00121   }
00122 
00123   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00124   { 
00125     if(var_sum >= var_array.size() || var_sum < 0)
00126       return 0;
00127     else
00128       return var_sum + 1; 
00129   }
00130 
00131   virtual void full_propagate()
00132   {
00133     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00134 
00135     if(var_sum <= 0)
00136       // Constraint trivially satisfied
00137       return;
00138 
00139     int array_size = var_array.size(); 
00140     int triggers_wanted = var_sum + 1;
00141     int index;
00142 
00143     for(index = 0; (index < array_size) && (triggers_wanted > 0); ++index) 
00144     {
00145       if(var_array[index].inDomain(1 - VarToCount))              
00146       {
00147     // delay setting up triggers in case we don't need to
00148         --triggers_wanted;
00149       }
00150     }       
00151 
00152     D_ASSERT(triggers_wanted >= 0);
00153 
00154     if(triggers_wanted > 1)    // Then we have failed, forget it.
00155     {
00156       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00157       return;
00158     }
00159     else if(triggers_wanted == 1)      // Then we can propagate 
00160     {                               // We never even set up triggers
00161       for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00162       {
00163         if(var_array[i].inDomain(1 - VarToCount))
00164         {
00165           if(VarToCount)
00166             var_array[i].setMax(0);
00167           else
00168             var_array[i].setMin(1);          
00169         }
00170       }
00171     }
00172     else                                // Now set up triggers
00173     {
00174       D_ASSERT(triggers_wanted == 0);
00175 
00176       int j = 0;
00177 
00178           // We only look at the elements of vararray that we looked at before
00179           // Exactly triggers_wanted of them have the val in their domain.
00180 
00181       for(int i = 0; (i < index); ++i)   // remember index was the elts we looked at
00182       { 
00183         if(var_array[i].inDomain(1 - VarToCount))
00184         {
00185           dt->trigger_info() = i;
00186           var_array[i].addDynamicTrigger(dt, VarToCount ? LowerBound : UpperBound);
00187           ++dt;
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191           unwatched(j) = i;
00192           ++j;
00193               // When run at root we could optimise as follows
00194               //    If VarToCount not in domain then do not put j in unwatched
00195               //      Instead decrement num_unwatched
00196         }
00197       }
00198 
00199       for(int i=index; i < array_size; ++i)
00200       {
00201         unwatched(j) = i;
00202         ++j;
00203       }
00204 
00205 
00206       D_ASSERT(j == num_unwatched);
00207     }
00208     return;
00209   }
00210 
00212   //
00213   //  NOT updated for new type of watched data structure
00214   //  
00215   BOOL check_consistency()
00216   {
00217     return true;
00218   }
00219 
00220   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00221   {
00222     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(DynSum);
00223     D_ASSERT(check_consistency());
00224     int propval = dt->trigger_info();
00225     D_ASSERT(var_array[propval].getAssignedValue() == VarToCount);
00226   // should generalise
00227   // and will need to loop round for watched lits
00228 
00229     bool found_new_support = false;
00230 
00231     int loop;
00232     int j;
00233 
00234     for(loop = 0 ; (!found_new_support) && loop < num_unwatched ; ++loop )
00235     {
00236       D_ASSERT(num_unwatched > 0);
00237 
00238       j = (last+1+loop) % num_unwatched; 
00239       if(var_array[unwatched(j)].inDomain(1 - VarToCount))
00240       {
00241         found_new_support = true;
00242       }
00243     }
00244 
00245     if (found_new_support)         // so we have found a new literal to watch
00246     {
00247       int& unwatched_index = unwatched(j);
00248 
00249       dt->trigger_info() = unwatched_index;
00250       var_array[unwatched_index].addDynamicTrigger(
00251         dt, 
00252         VarToCount ? LowerBound : UpperBound); 
00253 
00254       unwatched_index = propval;       
00255       last = j;
00256 
00257       return;
00258     }
00259 
00260   // there is no literal to watch, we need to propagate
00261 
00262     DynamicTrigger* dt2 = dynamic_trigger_start();
00263 
00264     for(int z = 0; z < var_sum + 1; ++z)
00265     {
00266       if(dt != dt2)       // that one has just been set the other way
00267       {
00268         if(VarToCount)
00269           var_array[dt2->trigger_info()].setMax(0);
00270         else
00271           var_array[dt2->trigger_info()].setMin(1);
00272       }
00273       dt2++;
00274     }
00275   }
00276 
00277   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00278   {
00279     D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size());
00280     int count = 0;
00281     for(int i = 0; i < v_size; ++i)
00282       count += (v[i] != VarToCount);
00283     return count >= var_sum;
00284   }
00285 
00286   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00287   { 
00288     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00289     vars.reserve(var_array.size());
00290     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00291       vars.push_back(AnyVarRef(var_array[i]));
00292     return vars;  
00293   }
00294 
00295   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00296   {
00297     if(var_sum <= 0)
00298     {
00299       return true;
00300     }
00301     
00302     int count = 0;
00303     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00304     {
00305       if(var_array[i].inDomain(!VarToCount))
00306       {
00307         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, !VarToCount));
00308         count++;
00309         if(count >= var_sum)
00310           return true;
00311       }
00312     }
00313     // We didn't make a complete assignment
00314     return false;
00315   }
00316   
00317   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00318    { return rev_implement<is_reversed>(); }
00319 
00320   template<bool b> 
00321    typename disable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00322    {
00323       return new BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic<VarArray, VarSum, 1-VarToCount, true>
00324                (stateObj, var_array, var_array.size()-var_sum+1);
00325    }
00326 
00327    template<bool b>
00328    typename enable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00329      { FAIL_EXIT(); }
00330 
00331 };
00332 
00333 template<typename VarArray,  typename VarSum>
00334 AbstractConstraint*
00335   BoolLessEqualSumConDynamic(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array,  VarSum _var_sum)
00336 {
00337   return new BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic<VarArray,VarSum>(stateObj, _var_array,
00338     runtime_val(_var_array.size() - _var_sum)); 
00339 }
00340 
00341 template<typename VarArray,  typename VarSum>
00342 AbstractConstraint*
00343   BoolGreaterEqualSumConDynamic(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array,  VarSum _var_sum)
00344 { 
00345   return new BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic<VarArray,VarSum,0>(stateObj, _var_array, _var_sum); 
00346 }

00349 #include "dynamic_sum_sat.h"
00350 #include "dynamic_binary_sat.h"
00351 #include "dynamic_3_sat.h"
00352 
00353 template<typename T>
00354 inline AbstractConstraint*
00355   BuildCT_WATCHED_LEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<T>& t1, ConstraintBlob& b)
00356 { 
00357   for(int i = 0; i < t1.size(); ++i)
00358   {
00359     if(t1[i].getInitialMin() != 0 || t1[i].getInitialMax() != 1)
00360       FAIL_EXIT("watched leqsum only works on Boolean variables!");
00361   }
00362 
00363   return BoolLessEqualSumConDynamic(stateObj, t1, runtime_val(b.constants[0][0]));
00364 }
00365 
00366 template<typename T>
00367 inline AbstractConstraint*
00368   BuildCT_WATCHED_GEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj,const vector<T>& t1, ConstraintBlob& b)
00369 { 
00370   for(int i = 0; i < t1.size(); ++i)
00371   {
00372     if(t1[i].getInitialMin() != 0 || t1[i].getInitialMax() != 1)
00373       FAIL_EXIT("watched geqsum only works on Boolean variables!");
00374   }
00375 
00376     int sum = b.constants[0][0];
00377 #ifndef SATSPECIAL1
00378     if(sum == 1)
00379     {
00380 #ifndef SATSPECIAL2
00381       if(t1.size() == 2)
00382       {
00383         return BoolBinarySATConDynamic(stateObj, t1);
00384       }
00385 #ifndef SATSPECIAL3
00386       else if(t1.size() == 3)
00387       {
00388         return BoolThreeSATConDynamic(stateObj, t1);
00389       }
00390 #endif
00391       else
00392 #endif
00393       {
00394         return BoolSATConDynamic(stateObj, t1);
00395       }
00396     }
00397     else
00398 #endif
00399     {
00400       return BoolGreaterEqualSumConDynamic(stateObj, t1, runtime_val(sum)); 
00401     }
00402 
00403 }
00404 
00405 #endif
